Typography

PICKI uses the Inter typeface. We chose Inter for itâ€™s versatility and readability, making it highly effective across a wide range of applications. Inter provides a well-balanced design ensuring clarity in both digital and print formats, enhancing user experience without compromising aesthetics. Inter supports multiple languages as it includes an extensive Latin character set. This allows a wide variety of other languages to be used. The sharp edges of the typeface contrasts well with the round styles we carry throughout the app, bringing a creative contrast to the users eye.
